code.description: A unique code identifying this coupon.

customerId.description:
Optional. Used to restrict the usage of this coupon to a specific customer.
When informed, must be a valid person id. See Person API.

expiresAt.description:
Optional. If informed, the coupon can only be used before the specified date.
Use ISO-8601 format and UTC timezone.

valueType.description:
Specifies how the value should be used. Currently, the only option is
"fixed_value" and the value must be specified as a fixed value in the
company's currency.

value.description: Discount value. See docs on the valueType attribute for details.

customerId.description: ID of order customer. See Person API.

nationalIdNum.description:
Alternative to customerId. Uses a unique national identifier (i.e. CPF in
Brazil) to inform the customer. If no customer with this identifier is
found, then a customer is created, otherwise the order uses the
customer already created in Awise. This property will be ignored if a
customerId is present.

discountValue.description:
Total order discount. Sum of all individual item discount added to general order discount, if any. All
individual items discounts are replaced by discountValue proportionaly divided by items value.

discount.description:
Order discount value. This value is proportionaly divided by items value and then added to individual items
discount value.

productId.description: Awise Product ID. See Product API.

productCode.description:
Alternative to productId. Uses the poduct code (i.e. SKU) to identify
the product in the order. The product must be previously created in
Awise to be found. This property will be ignored if productId is
present.

status.description:
- cr = created
- ca = canceled
- pa = packing
- rs = ready to ship
- it = in transit
- de = delivered

orderNumber.description:
Com php7 era retornado como string mesmo estando tipado como int, com php8 retorna int corretamente,
mas quebra o financial-entries, que espera string, por isso foi adicionado @JSON\Type("string")

coupons.description: List with the code of discount coupons used in this order, if any. See Coupons api.

info.title: Order
info.description: Replaces de Sales API. Used to register customer orders/sales.
